trans-unit.source: This property is deprecated. Use the COMPILE_OPTIONS property or the target_compile_options() command instead.

trans-unit.source: This property is enabled by default for targets that are created in directories that have EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL set to TRUE.

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored for non-framework targets, and when using single config generators.
trans-unit.target: 对于非框架目标以及使用单个配置生成器时,此属性会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored for targets that are not STATIC libraries. This property is ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 对于不是 STATIC 库的目标，将忽略此属性。对于未导入的目标，将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the target also has a non-empty INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES property.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标还具有非空的 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES 属性，则将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is implemented only for MS-compatible tools on Windows.

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized by the value of the variable CMAKE_XCODE_SCHEME_UNDEFINED_BEHAVIOUR_SANITIZER if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过变量 CMAKE_XCODE_SCHEME_UNDEFINED_BEHAVIOUR_SANITIZER 的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized by the value of the variable CMAKE_XCODE_SCHEME_UNDEFINED_BEHAVIOUR_SANITIZER_STOP if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过变量 CMAKE_XCODE_SCHEME_UNDEFINED_BEHAVIOUR_SANITIZER_STOP 的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized by the value of the variable CMAKE_XCODE_SCHEME_WORKING_DIRECTORY if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: This property is initialized by the value of the variable CMAKE_XCODE_SCHEME_WORKING_DIRECTORY if it is set when a target is created.

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized by the value of the variable CMAKE_XCODE_SCHEME_ZOMBIE_OBJECTS if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过变量 CMAKE_XCODE_SCHEME_ZOMBIE_OBJECTS 的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized by the value of the variable CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建目标时设置了CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY变量,则该属性由该变量的值初始化。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized by the value of the variable CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建目标时设置了CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY变量,则该属性由该变量的值初始化。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized by the value of the variable CMAKE_LINK_DEPENDS_NO_SHARED if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建目标时设置了变量CMAKE_LINK_DEPENDS_NO_SHARED,则此属性由其值初始化。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized by the value of the variable CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建目标时设置了 CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY 变量,则该属性由其值初始化。

trans-unit.source: This property is intended for use in naming libraries provided by a platform SDK for which the full path to a library file may not be known. The value may be a plain library name such as foo but may not be a path (e.g. /usr/lib/libfoo.so) or a flag (e.g. -Wl,...). The name is never treated as a library target name even if it happens to name one.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于在平台SDK提供的命名库中使用，而平台SDK的完整路径可能未知。该值可以是简单的库名，例如 foo ,但可以不是路径（例如 /usr/lib/libfoo.so ）或标志（例如 -Wl,... ）。该名称永远不会被当作库目标名称，即使它恰好是一个。

trans-unit.source: This property is mainly useful when trying to debug errors in your CMake scripts. It returns a list of what list files are currently being processed, in order. So if one listfile does an include() command then that is effectively pushing the included listfile onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 尝试调试CMake脚本中的错误时，此属性主要有用。它按顺序返回当前正在处理的列表文件的列表。因此，如果一个列表文件执行一个 include() 命令，那么这将有效地将包含的列表文件推入堆栈。

trans-unit.source: This property is obsolete. Use AUTOGEN_TARGETS_FOLDER instead.
trans-unit.target: 该属性已过时。请改用 AUTOGEN_TARGETS_FOLDER 。

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable to C# targets and Visual Studio generators 2010 and later.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于C#目标和Visual Studio生成器2010及以后版本。

trans-unit.source: This property is only evaluated Visual Studio Generators for VS 2010 and above.
trans-unit.target: 仅对VS 2010及更高版本的Visual Studio Generators评估此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is only evaluated for Visual Studio Generators VS 2010 and above.
trans-unit.target: 仅针对Visual Studio Generators VS 2010及更高版本评估此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is only used by Visual Studio generators. When set to TRUE, the target will not be built when you press Build Solution.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅由Visual Studio生成器使用。设置为 TRUE 时，按 Build Solution 时将不会构建目标。

trans-unit.source: This property is only used if the AUTOMOC property is ON for this target.
trans-unit.target: 仅当此目标的 AUTOMOC 属性为 ON 时，才使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is only used if the AUTOMOC property is ON for this target. In this case, it holds additional command line options which will be used when moc is executed during the build, i.e. it is equivalent to the optional OPTIONS argument of the qt4_wrap_cpp() macro.
trans-unit.target: 仅当此目标的 AUTOMOC 属性为 ON 时，才使用此属性。在这种情况下，它包含其他命令行选项，这些选项将在构建期间执行 moc 时使用，即，它等效于 qt4_wrap_cpp() 宏的可选 OPTIONS 参数。

trans-unit.source: This property is overridden by the INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES property if policy CMP0022 is NEW.
trans-unit.target: 如果策略 CMP0022 为 NEW ,则此属性将被 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES 属性覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only by Ninja and Makefile Generators. It is intended to specify dependencies on “linker scripts” for custom Makefile link rules.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Ninja 和Makefile Generators支持此属性。它旨在为自定义Makefile链接规则指定对“链接器脚本”的依赖性。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only by Ninja and Makefile Generators. It is intended to specify dependencies on “linker scripts” for custom Makefile link rules.
trans-unit.target: This property is supported only by Ninja and Makefile Generators. It is intended to specify dependencies on “linker scripts” for custom Makefile link rules.

trans-unit.source: This property is supported only when <LANG> is C or CXX.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 <LANG> 为 C 或 CXX 时才支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is the configuration-specific version of OSX_ARCHITECTURES.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是 OSX_ARCHITECTURES 的特定于配置的版本。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to initialize the COMPILE_OPTIONS target property when a target is created, which is used by the generators to set the options for the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 创建目标时，此属性用于初始化 COMPILE_OPTIONS 目标属性，生成器使用该目标属性来设置编译器的选项。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to initialize the LINK_OPTIONS target property when a target is created, which is used by the generators to set the options for the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 创建目标时，此属性用于初始化 LINK_OPTIONS 目标属性，生成器使用该目标属性来设置编译器的选项。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to populate the INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES target property, which is used by the generators to set the include directories for the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于填充 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 目标属性，生成器使用该属性设置编译器的包含目录。

trans-unit.source: This property maps to the actual value of a cache entry. Setting this property always sets the value without checking, so use with care.
trans-unit.target: 此属性映射到缓存条目的实际值。设置此属性总是在不检查的情况下设置值,所以要谨慎使用。

trans-unit.source: This property may use “generator expressions” with the syntax $<...>. See the cmake-generator-expressions(7) manual for available expressions.
trans-unit.target: 该属性可以使用语法 $<...> “生成器表达式” 。有关可用的表达式，请参见 cmake-generator-expressions(7) 手册。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set at the top level of the project and before the first target_link_libraries() command invocation. If any entry in the list does not match a valid configuration for the project the behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 此属性必须在项目的顶级设置，并且在第一个 target_link_libraries() 命令调用之前设置。如果列表中的任何条目与项目的有效配置都不匹配，则行为未定义。

trans-unit.source: This property must be used in preference to LINK_FLAGS property.
trans-unit.target: 必须优先使用此属性，而不要使用 LINK_FLAGS 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property must be used in preference to STATIC_LIBRARY_FLAGS property.
trans-unit.target: 必须优先于 STATIC_LIBRARY_FLAGS 属性使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property need not be used to specify the dependency of a source file on a generated header file that it includes. Although the property was originally introduced for this purpose, it is no longer necessary. If the generated header file is created by a custom command in the same target as the source file, the automatic dependency scanning process will recognize the dependency. If the generated header file is created by another target, an inter-target dependency should be created with the add_dependencies() command (if one does not already exist due to linking relationships).
trans-unit.target: 不需要使用此属性来指定源文件对其所生成的头文件的依赖性。尽管此属性最初是出于此目的而引入的，但不再是必需的。如果生成的头文件是通过与源文件位于同一目标中的自定义命令创建的，则自动依赖性扫描过程将识别出依赖性。如果生成的头文件是由另一个目标创建的，则应使用 add_dependencies() 命令创建目标间的依赖关系（如果由于链接关系而尚不存在）。

trans-unit.source: This property of “compatible interface requirement” may be extended to other properties by specifying the property in the content of the COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_BOOL target property. Each specified property must be compatible between the consuming target and the corresponding property with an INTERFACE_ prefix from each dependency:
trans-unit.target: 通过在 COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_BOOL 目标属性的内容中指定属性，可以将“兼容接口要求”的此属性扩展为其他属性。每个指定的属性必须在消费目标和每个依赖项中带有 INTERFACE_ 前缀的相应属性之间兼容：

trans-unit.source: This property only affects macOS, as iOS doesn’t have versioned directory structure.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅影响macOS，因为iOS没有版本控制的目录结构。

trans-unit.source: This property only applies to C# projects.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只适用于C#项目。

trans-unit.source: This property only works for Visual Studio 2010 and above; it is ignored on other generators.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于Visual Studio 2010及以上版本,在其他生成器上被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This property only works for Visual Studio 9 and above; it is ignored on other generators. The property only applies when set on a directory whose CMakeLists.txt contains a project() command.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于Visual Studio 9及更高版本；在其他生成器上将被忽略。该属性仅在设置在其 CMakeLists.txt 包含 project() 命令的目录上时适用。

trans-unit.source: This property only works for the Ninja and the Makefile generators. It is ignored by other generators.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于 Ninja 和Makefile生成器。其他生成器将忽略它。

trans-unit.source: This property only works for the Ninja and the Makefile generators. It is ignored by other generators.
trans-unit.target: This property only works for the Ninja and the Makefile generators. It is ignored by other generators.

trans-unit.source: This property only works for the Makefile generators. It is ignored on other generators.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只对Makefile生成器有效。在其他生成器上,该属性被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This property sets the language version for the Swift sources in the target. If one is not specified, it will default to <CMAKE_Swift_LANGUAGE_VERSION> if specified, otherwise it is the latest version supported by the compiler.
trans-unit.target: This property sets the language version for the Swift sources in the target. If one is not specified, it will default to <CMAKE_Swift_LANGUAGE_VERSION> if specified, otherwise it is the latest version supported by the compiler.

trans-unit.source: This property sets the path for the Swift dependency file (swiftdep) for the target. If one is not specified, it will default to <TARGET>.swiftdeps.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置目标的Swift依赖文件（swiftdep）的路径。如果未指定，则默认为 <TARGET>.swiftdeps 。

trans-unit.source: This property sets the path for the Swift dependency file (swiftdeps) for the source. If one is not specified, it will default to <OBJECT>.swiftdeps.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置源的Swift依赖文件（swiftdeps）的路径。如果未指定，则默认为 <OBJECT>.swiftdeps 。

trans-unit.source: This property should be preferred over the COMPILE_FLAGS property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性应比 COMPILE_FLAGS 属性更可取。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies rules to transform macro-like #include lines during implicit dependency scanning of C and C++ source files. The list of rules must be semicolon-separated with each entry of the form “A_MACRO(%)=value-with-%” (the % must be literal). During dependency scanning occurrences of A_MACRO(…) on #include lines will be replaced by the value given with the macro argument substituted for ‘%’. For example, the entry
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定在C和C ++源文件的隐式依赖项扫描期间转换类似于宏的#include行的规则。规则列表必须以分号分隔，并且每个条目的形式为“ A_MACRO（％）= value-with-％”（％必须是文字）。在依赖项扫描期间，在#include行上出现的A_MACRO（…）将被替换为用宏参数替换'％'的给定值。例如，条目

trans-unit.source: This property specifies rules to transform macro-like #include lines during implicit dependency scanning of C and C++ source files. The list of rules must be semicolon-separated with each entry of the form A_MACRO(%)=value-with-% (the % must be literal). During dependency scanning occurrences of A_MACRO(...) on #include lines will be replaced by the value given with the macro argument substituted for %. For example, the entry
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定在C和C ++源文件的隐式依赖项扫描期间转换类似于宏的 #include 行的规则。规则列表必须用分号分隔，每个条目的形式为 A_MACRO(%)=value-with-% （ % 必须是文字）。在依赖项扫描期间，在 #include 行上出现的 A_MACRO(...) 将替换为用宏参数替换 % 给出的值。例如，条目

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the C standard whose features are requested to build this target. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu11 to the compile line. For compilers that have no notion of a C standard level, such as all versions of MSVC known as of this version of CMake, this has no effect.
trans-unit.target: This property specifies the C standard whose features are requested to build this target. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu11 to the compile line. For compilers that have no notion of a C standard level, such as all versions of MSVC known as of this version of CMake, this has no effect.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the C standard whose features are requested to build this target. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu11 to the compile line. For compilers that have no notion of a standard level, such as Microsoft Visual C++ before 2015 Update 3, this has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定需要构建其目标的功能的C标准。对于某些编译器，这会导致在编译行中添加诸如 -std=gnu11 之类的标志。对于不具有标准级别概念的编译器，例如2015 Update 3之前的Microsoft Visual C ++，这无效。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the C++ standard whose features are requested to build this target. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu++11 to the compile line. For compilers that have no notion of a standard level, such as Microsoft Visual C++ before 2015 Update 3, this has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定需要C ++标准的功能来构建此目标。对于某些编译器，这会导致在编译行中添加诸如 -std=gnu++11 类的标志。对于不具有标准级别概念的编译器，例如2015 Update 3之前的Microsoft Visual C ++，这无效。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the CUDA/C++ standard whose features are requested to build this target. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu++11 to the compile line.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定CUDA / C ++标准，要求其功能来构建此目标。对于某些编译器，这会导致在编译行中添加诸如 -std=gnu++11 类的标志。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the OBJC standard whose features are requested to build this target. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu11 to the compile line.
trans-unit.target: This property specifies the OBJC standard whose features are requested to build this target. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu11 to the compile line.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the ObjC++ standard whose features are requested to build this target. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu++11 to the compile line.
trans-unit.target: This property specifies the ObjC++ standard whose features are requested to build this target. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu++11 to the compile line.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the base name for archive target files. It overrides OUTPUT_NAME and OUTPUT_NAME_<CONFIG> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定存档目标文件的基本名称。它会覆盖 OUTPUT_NAME 和 OUTPUT_NAME_<CONFIG> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the base name for library target files. It overrides OUTPUT_NAME and OUTPUT_NAME_<CONFIG> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定库目标文件的基本名称。它会覆盖 OUTPUT_NAME 和 OUTPUT_NAME_<CONFIG> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the base name for runtime target files. It overrides OUTPUT_NAME and OUTPUT_NAME_<CONFIG> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定运行时目标文件的基本名称。它会覆盖 OUTPUT_NAME 和 OUTPUT_NAME_<CONFIG> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the base name for the debug symbols file. If not set, the OUTPUT_NAME target property value or logical target name is used by default.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定调试符号文件的基本名称。如果未设置，则默认使用 OUTPUT_NAME 目标属性值或逻辑目标名称。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the base name for the debug symbols file. If not set, the default is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定了调试符号文件的基本名称。如果没有设置,则默认为未指定。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the directory into which archive target files should be built. The property value may use generator expressions. Multi-configuration generators (VS, Xcode) append a per-configuration subdirectory to the specified directory unless a generator expression is used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定应将归档目标文件构建到的目录。该属性值可以使用 generator expressions 。除非使用生成器表达式，否则多配置生成器（VS，Xcode）会将每个配置的子目录附加到指定目录。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the directory into which library target files should be built. The property value may use generator expressions. Multi-configuration generators (VS, Xcode) append a per-configuration subdirectory to the specified directory unless a generator expression is used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定应将库目标文件构建到的目录。该属性值可以使用 generator expressions 。除非使用生成器表达式，否则多配置生成器（VS，Xcode）会将每个配置的子目录附加到指定目录。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the directory into which runtime target files should be built. The property value may use generator expressions. Multi-configuration generators (VS, Xcode) append a per-configuration subdirectory to the specified directory unless a generator expression is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性指定运行时目标文件应构建到的目录。该属性值可以使用 generator expressions 。除非使用生成器表达式，否则多配置生成器（VS，Xcode）会将每个配置的子目录附加到指定目录。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the directory into which the MS debug symbols will be placed by the compiler. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_COMPILE_PDB_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定编译器将MS调试符号放置到的目录。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则该属性由 CMAKE_COMPILE_PDB_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY 变量的值初始化。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the directory into which the MS debug symbols will be placed by the linker. The property value may use generator expressions. Multi-configuration generators append a per-configuration subdirectory to the specified directory unless a generator expression is used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定链接器将MS调试符号放置到的目录。该属性值可以使用 generator expressions 。除非使用生成器表达式，否则多配置生成器会将每个配置的子目录追加到指定目录。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the list of directories given so far to the include_directories() command.
trans-unit.target: 该属性指定到目前为止给 include_directories() 命令提供的目录列表。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the list of directories given so far to the target_include_directories() command. In addition to accepting values from that command, values may be set directly on any target using the set_property() command. A target gets its initial value for this property from the value of the INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES directory property. Both directory and target property values are adjusted by calls to the include_directories() command.
trans-unit.target: 该属性指定到目前为止给 target_include_directories() 命令提供的目录列表。除了从该命令接受值之外，还可以使用 set_property() 命令在任何目标上直接设置值。目标从 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 目录属性的值获取此属性的初始值。目录和目标属性值都可以通过调用 include_directories() 命令进行调整。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the list of libraries or targets which will be used for linking. In addition to accepting values from the target_link_libraries() command, values may be set directly on any target using the set_property() command.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定将用于链接的库或目标的列表。除了从 target_link_libraries() 命令接受值之外，还可以使用 set_property() 命令在任何目标上直接设置值。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the list of options given so far to the add_compile_definitions() (or add_definitions()) command.
trans-unit.target: 该属性指定到目前为止给 add_compile_definitions() （或 add_definitions() ）命令提供的选项列表。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the name of the Swift module. It is defaulted to the name of the target.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定了 Swift 模块的名称。默认为目标的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the regular expression used during dependency scanning to match include files that should be followed. See the include_regular_expression() command for a high-level interface to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定在依赖项扫描过程中使用的正则表达式，以匹配应遵循的包含文件。请参阅 include_regular_expression() 命令以获取高级界面来设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether Makefile Generators should add a progress message describing that each target has been completed. If the property is not set the default is ON. Set the property to OFF to disable target completion messages.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定Makefile生成器是否应添加描述每个目标已完成的进度消息。如果未设置该属性，则默认值为 ON 。将该属性设置为 OFF 以禁用目标完成消息。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether Makefile generators should add a progress message describing what each build rule does. If the property is not set the default is ON. Set the property to OFF to disable granular messages and report only as each target completes. This is intended to allow scripted builds to avoid the build time cost of detailed reports. If a CMAKE_RULE_MESSAGES cache entry exists its value initializes the value of this property. Non-Makefile generators currently ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定Makefile生成器是否应添加进度消息，以描述每个构建规则的作用。如果未设置该属性，则默认值为ON。将该属性设置为OFF可禁用细粒度消息，并且仅在每个目标完成时进行报告。目的是允许脚本化构建避免详细报告的构建时间成本。如果 CMAKE_RULE_MESSAGES 高速缓存条目存在，则其值将初始化此属性的值。非Makefile生成器当前会忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether compiler specific extensions should be used. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu++11 instead of -std=c++11 to the compile line. This property is ON by default. The basic C++ standard level is controlled by the CXX_STANDARD target property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定是否应使用编译器特定的扩展。对于某些编译器，这会在编译行中添加 -std=gnu++11 类的标志，而不是 -std=c++11 。默认情况下，此属性为 ON 。基本的C ++标准级别由 CXX_STANDARD 目标属性控制。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether compiler specific extensions should be used. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu++11 instead of -std=c++11 to the compile line. This property is ON by default. The basic CUDA/C++ standard level is controlled by the CUDA_STANDARD target property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定是否应使用编译器特定的扩展。对于某些编译器，这会在编译行中添加 -std=gnu++11 类的标志，而不是 -std=c++11 。默认情况下，此属性为 ON 。基本的CUDA / C ++标准级别由 CUDA_STANDARD 目标属性控制。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether compiler specific extensions should be used. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu++11 instead of -std=c++11 to the compile line. This property is ON by default. The basic ObjC++ standard level is controlled by the OBJCXX_STANDARD target property.
trans-unit.target: This property specifies whether compiler specific extensions should be used. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu++11 instead of -std=c++11 to the compile line. This property is ON by default. The basic ObjC++ standard level is controlled by the OBJCXX_STANDARD target property.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether compiler specific extensions should be used. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu11 instead of -std=c11 to the compile line. This property is ON by default. The basic C standard level is controlled by the C_STANDARD target property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定是否应使用编译器特定的扩展。对于某些编译器，这会导致在编译行中添加 -std=gnu11 等标志，而不是 -std=c11 。默认情况下，此属性为 ON 。基本C标准级别由 C_STANDARD 目标属性控制。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether compiler specific extensions should be used. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu11 instead of -std=c11 to the compile line. This property is ON by default. The basic OBJC standard level is controlled by the OBJC_STANDARD target property.
trans-unit.target: This property specifies whether compiler specific extensions should be used. For some compilers, this results in adding a flag such as -std=gnu11 instead of -std=c11 to the compile line. This property is ON by default. The basic OBJC standard level is controlled by the OBJC_STANDARD target property.

trans-unit.source: This property supports generator expressions, except if the target is managed (contains C# code.)
trans-unit.target: This property supports generator expressions , except if the target is managed (contains C# code.)

trans-unit.source: This property supports generator expressions.
trans-unit.target: This property supports generator expressions .

trans-unit.source: This property supports generator expressions. In particular, the $<INSTALL_PREFIX> generator expression can be used to set the directory relative to the install-time prefix.
trans-unit.target: This property supports generator expressions . In particular, the $<INSTALL_PREFIX> generator expression can be used to set the directory relative to the install-time prefix.

trans-unit.source: This property supports generator expressions. See the cmake-generator-expressions(7) manual for available expressions.
trans-unit.target: 此属性支持生成器表达式。有关可用的表达式，请参见 cmake-generator-expressions(7) 手册。

trans-unit.source: This property tells CMake whether a given Fortran source file uses fixed-format or free-format. CMake will pass the corresponding format flag to the compiler. Consider using the target-wide Fortran_FORMAT property if all source files in a target share the same format.
trans-unit.target: 此属性告诉CMake给定的Fortran源文件使用固定格式还是自由格式。CMake会将相应的格式标志传递给编译器。如果目标中的所有源文件共享相同的格式，请考虑使用目标范围的 Fortran_FORMAT 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property tells CMake whether the Fortran source files in a target use fixed-format or free-format. CMake will pass the corresponding format flag to the compiler. Use the source-specific Fortran_FORMAT property to change the format of a specific source file. If the variable CMAKE_Fortran_FORMAT is set when a target is created its value is used to initialize this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性告诉CMake目标中的Fortran源文件是使用固定格式还是自由格式。CMake会将相应的格式标志传递给编译器。使用特定于源的 Fortran_FORMAT 属性来更改特定源文件的格式。如果在创建目标时设置了变量 CMAKE_Fortran_FORMAT ,则其值将用于初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property will be initialized in each directory by its value in the directory’s parent.
trans-unit.target: 该属性将在每个目录中通过其在目录父目录中的值进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: This property will usually get set via the xctest_add_bundle() macro in FindXCTest module.
trans-unit.target: 通常将通过 FindXCTest 模块中的 xctest_add_bundle() 宏来设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This read-only directory property contains a semicolon-separated list of buildsystem targets added in the directory by calls to the add_library(), add_executable(), and add_custom_target() commands. The list does not include any Imported Targets or Alias Targets, but does include Interface Libraries. Each entry in the list is the logical name of a target, suitable to pass to the get_property() command TARGET option.
trans-unit.target: 此只读目录属性包含通过调用 add_library() ， add_executable() 和 add_custom_target() 命令添加到目录中的，以分号分隔的构建系统目标列表。该列表不包括任何导入的目标或别名目标，但包括接口库。列表中的每个条目都是目标的逻辑名称，适合传递给 get_property() 命令 TARGET 选项。

trans-unit.source: This read-only directory property contains a semicolon-separated list of subdirectories processed so far by the add_subdirectory() or subdirs() commands. Each entry is the absolute path to the source directory (containing the CMakeLists.txt file). This is suitable to pass to the get_property() command DIRECTORY option.
trans-unit.target: 该只读目录属性包含以分号分隔的到目前为止由 add_subdirectory() 或 subdirs() 命令处理过的子目录列表。每个条目都是源目录（包含 CMakeLists.txt 文件）的绝对路径。这适合传递给 get_property() 命令 DIRECTORY 选项。

trans-unit.source: This read-only directory property reports absolute path to the binary directory corresponding to the source on which it is read.
trans-unit.target: 这个只读目录属性报告了读取源对应的二进制目录的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This read-only directory property reports absolute path to the source directory on which it is read.
trans-unit.target: 这个只读的目录属性报告了读取它的源目录的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property can be used to query all dependencies that were added for this target with the add_dependencies() command.
trans-unit.target: 此只读属性可用于查询使用 add_dependencies() 命令为此目标添加的所有依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property can be used to test the type of the given target. It will be one of STATIC_LIBRARY, MODULE_LIBRARY, SHARED_LIBRARY, OBJECT_LIBRARY, INTERFACE_LIBRARY, EXECUTABLE or one of the internal target types.
trans-unit.target: 此只读属性可用于测试给定目标的类型。它将是 STATIC_LIBRARY ， MODULE_LIBRARY ， SHARED_LIBRARY ， OBJECT_LIBRARY ， INTERFACE_LIBRARY ， EXECUTABLE 之一或内部目标类型之一。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property holds a semicolon-separated list of tests defined so far, in the current directory, by the add_test() command.
trans-unit.target: 此只读属性包含到目前为止用 add_test() 命令在当前目录中定义的以分号分隔的测试列表。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property reports the value of the CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR variable in the directory in which the target was defined.
trans-unit.target: 此只读属性报告定义目标的目录中 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 变量的值。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property reports the value of the CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR variable in the directory in which the target was defined.
trans-unit.target: 此只读属性报告定义目标的目录中 CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR 变量的值。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property specifies the list of CMake cache variables currently defined. It is intended for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 这个只读属性指定了当前定义的CMake缓存变量列表。它是为了调试的目的.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property specifies the list of CMake macros currently defined. It is intended for debugging purposes. See the macro() command.
trans-unit.target: 此只读属性指定当前定义的CMake宏的列表。它用于调试目的。请参阅 macro() 命令。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property specifies the list of CMake variables currently defined. It is intended for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 这个只读属性指定了当前定义的 CMake 变量列表。它是为了调试的目的.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property specifies the list of flags given so far to the add_definitions() command. It is intended for debugging purposes. Use the COMPILE_DEFINITIONS directory property instead.
trans-unit.target: 此只读属性指定到目前为止已给 add_definitions() 命令提供的标志的列表。它用于调试目的。请改用 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 目录属性。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property specifies the source directory that added the current source directory as a subdirectory of the build. In the top-level directory the value is the empty-string.
trans-unit.target: 这个只读属性指定了添加当前源目录作为构建子目录的源目录。在顶层目录中,该值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: This regex will match mylibrary.dll regardless of how it is cased, either on disk or in the depending file. (For example, it will match mylibrary.dll, MyLibrary.dll, and MYLIBRARY.DLL.)
trans-unit.target: This regex will match mylibrary.dll regardless of how it is cased, either on disk or in the depending file. (For example, it will match mylibrary.dll , MyLibrary.dll , and MYLIBRARY.DLL .)

trans-unit.source: This replaces the deprecated option --track. Despite the name change its behavior is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: This replaces the deprecated option --track . Despite the name change its behavior is unchanged.

trans-unit.source: This request can be sent after the initial handshake. It will return a JSON structure with information on cmake state.
trans-unit.target: 这个请求可以在初始握手后发送。它将返回一个包含 cmake 状态信息的 JSON 结构。

trans-unit.source: This request can be sent to change the global settings attributes. Unknown attributes are going to be ignored. Read-only attributes reported by “globalSettings” are all capabilities, buildDirectory, generator, extraGenerator and sourceDirectory. Any attempt to set these will be ignored, too.
trans-unit.target: 可以发送此请求以更改全局设置属性。未知属性将被忽略。“ globalSettings”报告的只读属性是所有功能，buildDirectory，生成器，extraGenerator和sourceDirectory。设置这些的任何尝试也将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This request is only available after a project was successfully “configure”d.
trans-unit.target: 仅在成功“配置”项目后，此请求才可用。

trans-unit.source: This request needs to pass one of the “supportedProtocolVersions” of the “hello” type response received earlier back to the server in the “protocolVersion” field. Giving the “major” version of the requested protocol version will make the server use the latest minor version of that protocol. Use this if you do not explicitly need to depend on a specific minor version.
trans-unit.target: 此请求需要将先前收到的“ hello”类型响应的“ supportedProtocolVersions”之一传递回“ protocolVersion”字段中的服务器。提供所请求协议版本的“主要”版本将使服务器使用该协议的最新次要版本。如果您不需要明确依赖特定的次要版本，请使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: This request will configure a project for build.
trans-unit.target: 这个请求将配置一个项目进行构建。

trans-unit.source: This request will generate build system files in the build directory and is only available after a project was successfully “configure”d.
trans-unit.target: 该请求将在构建目录中生成构建系统文件，并且仅在成功“配置”项目后才可用。

trans-unit.source: This script create a list of compiled Java class files to be added to a jar file. This avoids including cmake files which get created in the binary directory.
trans-unit.target: 这个脚本创建了一个编译后的Java类文件列表,并将其添加到一个jar文件中。这避免了在二进制目录下创建cmake文件。

trans-unit.source: This script expects to find libraries at $GSL_ROOT_DIR/lib and the GSL headers at $GSL_ROOT_DIR/include/gsl. The library directory may optionally provide Release and Debug folders. If available, the libraries named gsld, gslblasd or cblasd are recognized as debug libraries. For Unix-like systems, this script will use $GSL_ROOT_DIR/bin/gsl-config (if found) to aid in the discovery of GSL.
trans-unit.target: 该脚本期望在 $GSL_ROOT_DIR/lib 找到库，在 $GSL_ROOT_DIR/include/gsl 找到GSL标头。库目录可以选择提供Release和Debug文件夹。如果可用，则将名为 gsld ， gslblasd 或 cblasd 的库识别为调试库。对于类Unix系统，此脚本将使用 $GSL_ROOT_DIR/bin/gsl-config （如果找到）来帮助发现GSL。

trans-unit.source: This script is used to verify that embedded manifests and side by side manifests for a project match. To run this script, cd to a directory and run the script with cmake -P. On the command line you can pass in versions that are OK even if not found in the .manifest files. For example, cmake -Dallow_versions=8.0.50608.0 -PCmakeVerifyManifest.cmake could be used to allow an embedded manifest of 8.0.50608.0 to be used in a project even if that version was not found in the .manifest file.
trans-unit.target: 这个脚本用于验证项目的嵌入式清单和并列清单是否匹配。要运行这个脚本,请cd到一个目录,然后用cmake -P运行这个脚本。在命令行中,你可以传入即使在.manifest文件中没有找到的版本也是可以的。例如,cmake -Dallow_versions=8.0.50608.0 -PCmakeVerifyManifest.cmake可以用来允许在项目中使用8.0.50608.0的嵌入式清单,即使在.manifest文件中找不到这个版本。

trans-unit.source: This script launches a GUI test using Squish. You should not call the script directly; instead, you should access it via the SQUISH_ADD_TEST macro that is defined in FindSquish.cmake.
trans-unit.target: 这个脚本使用Squish启动了一个GUI测试。你不应该直接调用这个脚本,而是应该通过FindSquish.cmake中定义的SQUISH_ADD_TEST宏来访问它。

trans-unit.source: This script locates the NVIDIA CUDA C tools. It should work on Linux, Windows, and macOS and should be reasonably up to date with CUDA C releases.
trans-unit.target: 这个脚本可以定位NVIDIA CUDA C工具。它应该可以在Linux、Windows和macOS上运行,并且应该是CUDA C版本的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: This script locates the NVIDIA CUDA toolkit and the associated libraries, but does not require the CUDA language be enabled for a given project. This module does not search for the NVIDIA CUDA Samples.
trans-unit.target: This script locates the NVIDIA CUDA toolkit and the associated libraries, but does not require the CUDA language be enabled for a given project. This module does not search for the NVIDIA CUDA Samples.

trans-unit.source: This script makes use of the standard find_package() arguments of <VERSION>, REQUIRED and QUIET. CUDA_FOUND will report if an acceptable version of CUDA was found.
trans-unit.target: 该脚本利用了 <VERSION> ， REQUIRED 和 QUIET 的标准 find_package() 参数。 CUDA_FOUND 将报告是否找到了可接受的CUDA版本。

trans-unit.source: This script starts the Squish server, launches the test on the client, and finally stops the squish server. If any of these steps fail (including if the tests do not pass) then a fatal error is raised.
trans-unit.target: 这个脚本启动Squish服务器,在客户端启动测试,最后停止squish服务器。如果这些步骤中有任何一个失败(包括测试没有通过),那么就会出现一个致命的错误。

trans-unit.source: This second signature is deprecated, but still available for backwards compatibility. Use the first signature instead.
trans-unit.target: 第二种签名已被废弃,但仍可用于向后兼容。请使用第一个签名。

trans-unit.source: This second signature is used to upload files to CDash via the CDash file upload API. The API first sends a request to upload to CDash along with a content hash of the file. If CDash does not already have the file, then it is uploaded. Along with the file, a CDash type string is specified to tell CDash which handler to use to process the data.
trans-unit.target: 这第二个签名用于通过CDash文件上传API向CDash上传文件。API首先发送一个上传至CDash的请求以及文件的内容哈希。如果CDash还没有该文件,那么它就会被上传。除了文件之外,还指定了一个CDash类型字符串来告诉CDash使用哪个处理程序来处理数据。

trans-unit.source: This set of directories is intended to work in cooperation with projects that provide configuration files in their installation trees. Directories above marked with (W) are intended for installations on Windows where the prefix may point at the top of an application’s installation directory. Those marked with (U) are intended for installations on UNIX platforms where the prefix is shared by multiple packages. This is merely a convention, so all (W) and (U) directories are still searched on all platforms. Directories marked with (A) are intended for installations on Apple platforms. The CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK and CMAKE_FIND_APPBUNDLE variables determine the order of preference.
trans-unit.target: 这组目录旨在与在其安装树中提供配置文件的项目一起工作。上面标有（ W ）的目录旨在用于Windows上的安装，其中前缀可能指向应用程序的安装目录的顶部。标有（ U ）的标记用于在前缀由多个软件包共享的UNIX平台上安装。这只是一个约定，因此仍在所有平台上搜索所有（ W ）和（ U ）目录。标有（ A ）的目录旨在在Apple平台上安装。该 CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK 和 CMAKE_FIND_APPBUNDLE 变量确定优先顺序。

trans-unit.source: This sets the base name for output files created for an executable or library target. If not set, the logical target name is used by default during generation. The value is not set by default during configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此项设置为可执行文件或库目标创建的输出文件的基本名称。如果没有设置,则生成过程中默认使用逻辑目标名称。在配置过程中,默认情况下不设置该值。

trans-unit.source: This sets the name for the IMPORTED target generated by the install(EXPORT) and export() commands. If not set, the logical target name is used by default.
trans-unit.target: 这将设置由 install(EXPORT) 和 export() 命令生成的 IMPORTED 目标的名称。如果未设置，则默认使用逻辑目标名称。

trans-unit.source: This setting allows CTest to pass arbitrary information about this build up to CDash. One use of this feature is to allow CDash to post comments on your pull request if anything goes wrong with your build.
trans-unit.target: 这个设置允许CTest将这个构建的任意信息传递给CDash。这个特性的一个用途是允许CDash在你的pull request上发布评论,如果你的构建有任何问题的话。

trans-unit.source: This should be the homepage of the package, or something similar. Ideally this is set already directly in the Find-module.
trans-unit.target: 这应该是包的主页,或者类似的东西。理想的情况是,它已经直接在Find-module中设置了。

trans-unit.source: This should be used carefully in cases where some source files are picked up through external headers during the build.
trans-unit.target: 当一些源文件在构建过程中通过外部头文件被拾取时,应谨慎使用。

trans-unit.source: This should define some variables starting PC_Foo_ that contain the information from the Foo.pc file.
trans-unit.target: 这应该定义一些以 PC_Foo_ 开头的变量，这些变量包含 Foo.pc 文件中的信息。

trans-unit.source: This shows setting the variable for the Release configuration only.
trans-unit.target: 此处显示的是仅针对Release配置的变量设置。

trans-unit.source: This shows setting the variable for the target foo.
trans-unit.target: 这显示了为目标foo设置变量。

trans-unit.source: This signature accepts the SUBMIT_URL, BUILD_ID, HTTPHEADER, RETRY_COUNT, RETRY_DELAY, RETURN_VALUE and QUIET options as described above.
trans-unit.target: SUBMIT_URL ，此签名接受SUBMIT_URL， BUILD_ID ， HTTPHEADER ， RETRY_COUNT ， RETRY_DELAY ， RETURN_VALUE 和 QUIET 选项。

trans-unit.source: This signature exports cmake built targets to the android ndk build system by creating an Android.mk file that references the prebuilt targets. The Android NDK supports the use of prebuilt libraries, both static and shared. This allows cmake to build the libraries of a project and make them available to an ndk build system complete with transitive dependencies, include flags and defines required to use the libraries. The signature takes a list of targets and puts them in the Android.mk file specified by the <filename> given. This signature can only be used if policy CMP0022 is NEW for all targets given. A error will be issued if that policy is set to OLD for one of the targets.
trans-unit.target: 此签名通过创建引用预构建目标的Android.mk文件将cmake构建目标导出到android ndk构建系统。Android NDK支持使用静态和共享的预构建库。这允许cmake构建项目的库，并使它们可用于具有传递依赖项，包括标志和使用库所需的定义的完整ndk构建系统。签名获取目标列表，并将其放入给定的 <filename> 指定的Android.mk文件中。仅当给定的所有目标的策略CMP0022为NEW时，才可以使用此签名。如果将其中一个目标的策略设置为OLD，则将发出错误。

trans-unit.source: This signature is for compatibility only. Prefer the INTERFACE mode instead.
trans-unit.target: 该签名仅用于兼容性。请改用 INTERFACE 模式。

trans-unit.source: This signature is for compatibility only. Prefer the PUBLIC or PRIVATE keywords instead.
trans-unit.target: 该签名仅用于兼容性。请改用 PUBLIC 或 PRIVATE 关键字。

trans-unit.source: This signature is similar to the EXPORT signature, but targets are listed explicitly rather than specified as an export-name. If the APPEND option is given the generated code will be appended to the file instead of overwriting it. The EXPORT_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES keyword, if present, causes the contents of the properties matching (IMPORTED_)?LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES(_<CONFIG>)? to be exported, when policy CMP0022 is NEW. If a library target is included in the export but a target to which it links is not included the behavior is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 该签名类似于 EXPORT 签名，但是目标是显式列出的，而不是指定为导出名称。如果给出了APPEND选项，则生成的代码将被附加到文件中，而不是覆盖它。如果存在EXPORT_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES关键字，则导致匹配 (IMPORTED_)?LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES(_<CONFIG>)? 的属性的内容？LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES（_ <CONFIG>）？策略CMP0022为NEW时要导出。如果导出中包含库目标，但未包含链接到的目标，则行为未指定。

trans-unit.source: This specifies name of the program that randomizes libraries on UNIX, not used on Windows, but may be present.
trans-unit.target: 这指定了UNIX上随机化库的程序名称,在Windows上没有使用,但可能存在。

trans-unit.source: This specifies that the current CMake code is written for the given range of CMake versions. All policies known to the running version of CMake and introduced in the <min> (or <max>, if specified) version or earlier will be set to use NEW behavior. All policies introduced in later versions will be unset (unless the CMAKE_POLICY_DEFAULT_CMP<NNNN> variable sets a default). This effectively requests behavior preferred as of a given CMake version and tells newer CMake versions to warn about their new policies.
trans-unit.target: 这指定为给定的CMake版本范围编写当前的CMake代码。 CMake的运行版本已知的所有策略，并且在 <min> （或 <max> ，如果指定）版本或更早版本中引入的所有策略都将设置为使用 NEW 行为。更高版本中引入的所有策略都将被取消设置（除非 CMAKE_POLICY_DEFAULT_CMP<NNNN> 变量设置为默认值）。这有效地请求了从给定CMake版本开始的首选行为，并告知较新的CMake版本警告其新策略。

trans-unit.source: This specifies the name of the program that creates archive or static libraries.
trans-unit.target: 这指定了创建存档或静态库的程序名称。

trans-unit.source: This specifies the use of different compile definitions based on both the compiler id and compilation language. This example will have a COMPILING_CXX_WITH_CLANG compile definition when Clang is the CXX compiler, and COMPILING_CXX_WITH_INTEL when Intel is the CXX compiler. Likewise when the C compiler is Clang it will only see the COMPILING_C_WITH_CLANG definition.
trans-unit.target: 这指定基于编译器ID和编译语言使用不同的编译定义。这个例子将有 COMPILING_CXX_WITH_CLANG 编译定义时锵是CXX编译器和 COMPILING_CXX_WITH_INTEL 当英特尔是CXX编译器。同样，当C编译器为Clang时，它将仅看到 COMPILING_C_WITH_CLANG 定义。

trans-unit.source: This specifies the use of different link libraries based on both the compiler id and link language. This example will have target libCXX_Clang as link dependency when Clang or AppleClang is the CXX linker, and libCXX_Intel when Intel is the CXX linker. Likewise when the C linker is Clang or AppleClang, target libC_Clang will be added as link dependency and libC_Intel when Intel is the C linker.
trans-unit.target: 这基于编译器ID和链接语言指定使用不同的链接库。当 Clang 或 AppleClang 是 CXX 链接器时，此示例将目标 libCXX_Clang 作为链接依赖 libCXX_Intel 当 Intel 是 CXX 链接器时，此示例将具有libCXX_Intel。同样，当 C 链接器是 Clang 或 AppleClang 时，如果 Intel 是 C 链接器， libC_Intel 目标 libC_Clang 添加为链接依赖项，并添加libC_Intel。

trans-unit.source: This specifies the use of the -fno-exceptions compile option, COMPILING_CXX compile definition, and cxx_headers include directory for C++ only (compiler id checks elided). It also specifies a COMPILING_CUDA compile definition for CUDA.
trans-unit.target: 这指定了使用的 -fno-exceptions 编译选项， COMPILING_CXX 编译定义，和 cxx_headers 包括用于C ++只是（消隐编译器ID检查）目录。它还为CUDA 指定了 COMPILING_CUDA 编译定义。

trans-unit.source: This specifies to use the api target for linking targets myapp1 and myapp2. In practice, myapp1 will link with target api_C and option -opt_c because it will use C as link language. And myapp2 will link with api_CXX and option -opt_cxx because CXX will be the link language.
trans-unit.target: 这指定使用 api 目标来链接目标 myapp1 和 myapp2 。实际上， myapp1 将与目标 api_C 和选项 -opt_c 链接，因为它将使用 C 作为链接语言。而且 myapp2 将使用 api_CXX 和选项 -opt_cxx 进行链接，因为 CXX 是链接语言。

trans-unit.source: This specifies what build types (configurations) will be available such as Debug, Release, RelWithDebInfo etc. This has reasonable defaults on most platforms, but can be extended to provide other build types. See also CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE for details of managing configuration data, and CMAKE_CFG_INTDIR.
trans-unit.target: 这指定了可用的构建类型（配置），例如 Debug ， Release ， RelWithDebInfo 等。在大多数平台上，它具有合理的默认值，但可以扩展为提供其他构建类型。另请参阅 CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE 以获取管理配置数据的详细信息，以及 CMAKE_CFG_INTDIR 。

trans-unit.source: This specifies what prefixes to add to library names when the find_library() command looks for libraries. On UNIX systems this is typically lib, meaning that when trying to find the foo library it will look for libfoo.
trans-unit.target: 这指定当 find_library() 命令查找库时要添加到库名称的前缀。在UNIX系统上，这通常是 lib ，这意味着在尝试查找 foo 库时，它将查找 libfoo 。

trans-unit.source: This specifies what suffixes to add to library names when the find_library() command looks for libraries. On Windows systems this is typically .lib and .dll, meaning that when trying to find the foo library it will look for foo.dll etc.
trans-unit.target: 这指定当 find_library() 命令查找库时要添加到库名称的后缀。在Windows系统上，这通常是 .lib 和 .dll ，这意味着在尝试查找 foo 库时，它将查找 foo.dll 等。

trans-unit.source: This specifies whether the lower end point of the version range is included or excluded. Currently, INCLUDE is the only supported value.
trans-unit.target: 这指定是包含还是排除版本范围的下端点。当前， INCLUDE 是唯一受支持的值。

trans-unit.source: This specifies whether the lower end point of the version range should be included or excluded. Currently, the only supported value for this variable is INCLUDE.
trans-unit.target: 这指定是应包含还是排除版本范围的下端点。当前，此变量唯一支持的值为 INCLUDE 。

trans-unit.source: This specifies whether the upper end point of the version range is included or excluded. The possible values for this variable are INCLUDE or EXCLUDE.
trans-unit.target: 这指定是包含还是排除版本范围的上端点。该变量的可能值为 INCLUDE 或 EXCLUDE 。

trans-unit.source: This specifies whether the upper end point of the version range should be included or excluded. The supported values for this variable are INCLUDE and EXCLUDE.
trans-unit.target: 这指定是应包含还是排除版本范围的上端点。此变量支持的值为 INCLUDE 和 EXCLUDE 。

trans-unit.source: This statically specifies what build type (configuration) will be built in this build tree. Possible values are empty, Debug, Release, RelWithDebInfo, MinSizeRel, … This variable is only meaningful to single-configuration generators (such as Makefile Generators and Ninja) i.e. those which choose a single configuration when CMake runs to generate a build tree as opposed to multi-configuration generators which offer selection of the build configuration within the generated build environment. There are many per-config properties and variables (usually following clean SOME_VAR_<CONFIG> order conventions), such as CMAKE_C_FLAGS_<CONFIG>, specified as uppercase: CMAKE_C_FLAGS_[DEBUG|RELEASE|RELWITHDEBINFO|MINSIZEREL|...]. For example, in a build tree configured to build type Debug, CMake will see to having CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG settings get added to the CMAKE_C_FLAGS settings. See also CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES.
trans-unit.target: 这静态指定将在此构建树中构建哪种构建类型（配置）。可能的值为空， Debug ， Release ， RelWithDebInfo ， MinSizeRel ……此变量仅对单一配置生成器（例如Makefile Generators和 Ninja ）有意义，即那些在CMake运行时生成单一生成树的情况下选择单一配置的生成器多配置生成器，可以在生成的构建环境中选择构建配置。有许多每个配置的属性和变量（通常遵循干净的 SOME_VAR_<CONFIG> 顺序约定），例如 CMAKE_C_FLAGS_<CONFIG> ，以大写 CMAKE_C_FLAGS_[DEBUG|RELEASE|RELWITHDEBINFO|MINSIZEREL|...] 指定：CMAKE_C_FLAGS_ [DEBUG | RELEASE | RELWITHDEBINFO | MINSIZEREL | ...]。例如，在配置为构建类型 Debug 的构建树中，CMake将看到 CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG 设置添加到 CMAKE_C_FLAGS 设置中。另请参阅 CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES 。

trans-unit.source: This statically specifies what build type (configuration) will be built in this build tree. Possible values are empty, Debug, Release, RelWithDebInfo, MinSizeRel, … This variable is only meaningful to single-configuration generators (such as Makefile Generators and Ninja) i.e. those which choose a single configuration when CMake runs to generate a build tree as opposed to multi-configuration generators which offer selection of the build configuration within the generated build environment. There are many per-config properties and variables (usually following clean SOME_VAR_<CONFIG> order conventions), such as CMAKE_C_FLAGS_<CONFIG>, specified as uppercase: CMAKE_C_FLAGS_[DEBUG|RELEASE|RELWITHDEBINFO|MINSIZEREL|...]. For example, in a build tree configured to build type Debug, CMake will see to having CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG settings get added to the CMAKE_C_FLAGS settings. See also CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES.
trans-unit.target: 这将静态指定将在此构建树中构建的构建类型（配置）。可能的值为空， Debug ， Release ， RelWithDebInfo ， MinSizeRel ……此变量仅对单一配置生成器（例如Makefile Generators和 Ninja ）有意义，即那些在CMake运行时生成单一生成树的情况下选择单一配置的生成器多配置生成器，可以在生成的构建环境中选择构建配置。有许多每个配置的属性和变量（通常遵循干净的 SOME_VAR_<CONFIG> 顺序约定），例如 CMAKE_C_FLAGS_<CONFIG> ，以大写 CMAKE_C_FLAGS_[DEBUG|RELEASE|RELWITHDEBINFO|MINSIZEREL|...] 指定：CMAKE_C_FLAGS_ [DEBUG | RELEASE | RELWITHDEBINFO | MINSIZEREL | ...]。例如，在配置为构建类型 Debug 的构建树中，CMake将看到 CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG 设置添加到 CMAKE_C_FLAGS 设置中。另请参阅 CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES 。

trans-unit.source: This stores the flag needed to pass the value of the Fortran_MODULE_DIRECTORY target property to the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 这将存储将 Fortran_MODULE_DIRECTORY 目标属性的值传递给编译器所需的标志。

trans-unit.source: This stores the major version of CMake used to write a CMake cache file. It is only different when a different version of CMake is run on a previously created cache file.
trans-unit.target: 它存储了用于编写 CMake 缓存文件的 CMake 的主要版本。只有当不同版本的CMake在之前创建的缓存文件上运行时,它才会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: This stores the minor version of CMake used to write a CMake cache file. It is only different when a different version of CMake is run on a previously created cache file.
trans-unit.target: 它存储了用于编写 CMake 缓存文件的 CMake 的次要版本。只有当不同版本的CMake在之前创建的缓存文件上运行时,它才会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: This stores the patch version of CMake used to write a CMake cache file. It is only different when a different version of CMake is run on a previously created cache file.
trans-unit.target: 它存储了用于编写 CMake 缓存文件的 CMake 补丁版本。只有当不同版本的 CMake 在之前创建的缓存文件上运行时,它才会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: This string summarizes the purpose of an entry to help users set it through a CMake GUI.
trans-unit.target: 这个字符串总结了一个条目的目的,以帮助用户通过CMake GUI进行设置。

trans-unit.source: This subcommand queries the symlink <linkname> and stores the path it points to in the result <variable>. If <linkname> does not exist or is not a symlink, CMake issues a fatal error.
trans-unit.target: 此子命令查询符号链接 <linkname> 并将其指向的路径存储在结果 <variable> 中。如果 <linkname> 不存在或不是符号链接，则CMake会发出致命错误。

trans-unit.source: This suboption can be repeated several times for multiple headers.
trans-unit.target: 这个子选项可以为多个标题重复多次。

trans-unit.source: This switch should be used during the initial CMake run. Otherwise if the package has already been found in a previous CMake run, the variables which have been stored in the cache will still be there. In that case it is recommended to remove the cache variables for this package from the cache using the cache editor or cmake(1)-U
trans-unit.target: 此开关应在初始CMake运行期间使用。否则，如果在先前的CMake运行中已经找到该程序包，则已存储在缓存中的变量将仍然存在。在这种情况下，建议使用缓存编辑器或 cmake(1) -U 从缓存中删除此程序包的缓存变量。

trans-unit.source: This target is a CFBundle on the macOS.
trans-unit.target: 此目标是macOS上的 CFBundle 。

trans-unit.source: This target is a XCTest CFBundle on the Mac.
trans-unit.target: 这个目标是Mac上的XCTest CFBundle。

trans-unit.source: This target-level dependency does NOT add a file-level dependency that would cause the custom command to re-run whenever the executable is recompiled. List target names with the DEPENDS option to add such file-level dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 此目标级别的依存关系不会添加文件级的依存关系，只要重新编译可执行文件，该文件级的依存关系就会导致自定义命令重新运行。使用 DEPENDS 选项列出目标名称，以添加此类文件级依赖性。

trans-unit.source: This the full path to the build directory that is currently being processed by cmake. Each directory added by add_subdirectory() will create a binary directory in the build tree, and as it is being processed this variable will be set. For in-source builds this is the current source directory being processed.
trans-unit.target: 这是cmake当前正在处理的构建目录的完整路径。由 add_subdirectory() 添加的每个目录都将在构建树中创建一个二进制目录，并且在处理该变量时将对其进行设置。对于源代码内部版本，这是当前正在处理的源目录。

trans-unit.source: This the full path to the source directory that is currently being processed by cmake.
trans-unit.target: 这是当前被 cmake 处理的源目录的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: This type is used by the server to reply to requests.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型被服务器用来回复请求。

trans-unit.source: This type is used to return an error condition to the client. It will contain an “errorMessage”.
trans-unit.target: 此类型用于将错误条件返回给客户端。它将包含“ errorMessage”。

trans-unit.source: This value is not used for Fortran because it has no standard library headers and some compilers do not search their implicit include directories for module .mod files.
trans-unit.target: 此值不用于 Fortran ,因为它没有标准库头，并且某些编译器不会在其隐式包含目录中搜索模块 .mod 文件。

trans-unit.source: This value must be one of the types defined in the FeatureSummary_PKG_TYPES global property unless the package type is set for all the packages.
trans-unit.target: 该值必须是 FeatureSummary_PKG_TYPES 全局属性中定义的类型之一，除非为所有软件包都设置了软件包类型。

trans-unit.source: This variable affects how find_* commands choose between macOS Application Bundles and unix-style package components.
trans-unit.target: 此变量影响 find_* 命令在macOS应用程序捆绑包和Unix样式的软件包组件之间进行选择的方式。

trans-unit.source: This variable affects how find_* commands choose between macOS Frameworks and unix-style package components.
trans-unit.target: 此变量影响 find_* 命令在macOS框架和Unix样式的软件包组件之间进行选择的方式。

trans-unit.source: This variable affects the default behavior of the include_directories() command. Setting this variable to ON is equivalent to using the BEFORE option in all uses of that command.
trans-unit.target: 此变量影响 include_directories() 命令的默认行为。将此变量设置为 ON 等效于在该命令的所有用法中使用 BEFORE 选项。

trans-unit.source: This variable affects the default behavior of the link_directories() command. Setting this variable to ON is equivalent to using the BEFORE option in all uses of that command.
trans-unit.target: 此变量影响 link_directories() 命令的默认行为。将此变量设置为 ON 等效于在该命令的所有用法中使用 BEFORE 选项。

trans-unit.source: This variable affects the order of include directories generated in compiler command lines. If set to ON, it causes the CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR and the CMAKE_BINARY_DIR to appear first.
trans-unit.target: 此变量影响在编译器命令行中生成的包含目录的顺序。如果设置为 ON ，它将导致 CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR 和 CMAKE_BINARY_DIR 首先出现。

trans-unit.source: This variable allows to override Visual Studio default Exclude Directories.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量允许覆盖Visual Studio默认的排除目录。

trans-unit.source: This variable allows to override Visual Studio default Executable Directories.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量允许覆盖Visual Studio默认的可执行目录。

trans-unit.source: This variable allows to override Visual Studio default Include Directories.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量允许覆盖Visual Studio默认的Include Directories。

trans-unit.source: This variable allows to override Visual Studio default Library Directories.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量允许覆盖Visual Studio默认的库目录。

trans-unit.source: This variable allows to override Visual Studio default Library WinRT Directories.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量允许覆盖Visual Studio默认的库WinRT目录。

trans-unit.source: This variable allows to override Visual Studio default Reference Directories.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量允许覆盖Visual Studio默认的参考目录。

trans-unit.source: This variable allows to override Visual Studio default Source Directories.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量允许覆盖Visual Studio默认的Source Directories。

trans-unit.source: This variable can be populated with a list of properties to generate debug output for when evaluating target properties. Currently it can only be used when evaluating:
trans-unit.target: 当评估目标属性时,可以用属性列表填充这个变量来生成调试输出。目前它只能在评估时使用。

trans-unit.source: This variable can be set by the user during the first time a build tree is configured.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量可以由用户在第一次配置构建树时进行设置。

trans-unit.source: This variable contains a list of env vars as a list of tokens with the syntax var=value.
trans-unit.target: 此变量包含一个env vars列表，作为带有 var=value 语法的令牌列表。

trans-unit.source: This variable controls the number of parallel jobs that the swift driver creates for building targets. If not specified, it will default to the number of logical CPUs on the host.
trans-unit.target: 此变量控制 swift 驱动程序为构建目标创建的并行作业数量。如果没有指定,它将默认为主机上的逻辑 CPU 数量。

trans-unit.source: This variable controls whether the CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH and CMAKE_SYSROOT are used by find_file() and find_path().
trans-unit.target: 这个变量控制是否 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 和 CMAKE_SYSROOT 通过使用 find_file() 和 find_path() 。

trans-unit.source: This variable controls whether the CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH and CMAKE_SYSROOT are used by find_file() and find_path().
trans-unit.target: 这个变量控制是否 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 和 CMAKE_SYSROOT 通过使用 find_file() 和 find_path() 。

trans-unit.source: This variable controls whether the CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH and CMAKE_SYSROOT are used by find_library().
trans-unit.target: 这个变量控制是否 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 和 CMAKE_SYSROOT 通过使用 find_library() 。

trans-unit.source: This variable controls whether the CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH and CMAKE_SYSROOT are used by find_library().
trans-unit.target: 这个变量控制是否 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 和 CMAKE_SYSROOT 通过使用 find_library() 。

trans-unit.source: This variable controls whether the CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH and CMAKE_SYSROOT are used by find_package().
trans-unit.target: 这个变量控制是否 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 和 CMAKE_SYSROOT 通过使用 find_package() 。

trans-unit.source: This variable controls whether the CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH and CMAKE_SYSROOT are used by find_package().
trans-unit.target: 这个变量控制是否 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 和 CMAKE_SYSROOT 通过使用 find_package() 。

trans-unit.source: This variable controls whether the CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH and CMAKE_SYSROOT are used by find_program().
trans-unit.target: 这个变量控制是否 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 和 CMAKE_SYSROOT 通过使用 find_program() 。

trans-unit.source: This variable controls whether the CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH and CMAKE_SYSROOT are used by find_program().
trans-unit.target: 这个变量控制是否 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 和 CMAKE_SYSROOT 通过使用 find_program() 。

trans-unit.source: This variable defines how lookup will be done. The Python2_FIND_STRATEGY variable can be set to empty or one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 此变量定义查找的方式。所述 Python2_FIND_STRATEGY 变量可以被设置为空或下列之一：

trans-unit.target: 此变量定义查找的方式。所述 Python3_FIND_STRATEGY 变量可以被设置为执行以下操作之一：

trans-unit.target: 此变量定义查找的方式。所述 Python_FIND_STRATEGY 变量可以被设置为空或下列之一：

trans-unit.source: This variable defines how lookup will be done. The Python_FIND_STRATEGY variable can be set to one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 此变量定义查找的方式。所述 Python_FIND_STRATEGY 变量可以被设置为执行以下操作之一：

trans-unit.source: This variable defines the handling of virtual environments managed by rvm. It is meaningful only when a virtual environment is active (i.e. the rvm script has been evaluated or at least the MY_RUBY_HOME environment variable is set). The Ruby_FIND_VIRTUALENV variable can be set to empty or one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 该变量定义了由 rvm 管理的虚拟环境的处理。仅当虚拟环境处于活动状态（即，已评估 rvm 脚本或至少设置了 MY_RUBY_HOME 环境变量）时，此选项才有意义。所述 Ruby_FIND_VIRTUALENV 变量可以被设置为空或下列之一：

trans-unit.source: This variable defines the handling of virtual environments managed by virtualenv or conda. It is meaningful only when a virtual environment is active (i.e. the activate script has been evaluated). In this case, it takes precedence over Python2_FIND_REGISTRY and CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK variables. The Python2_FIND_VIRTUALENV variable can be set to one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 此变量定义对由 virtualenv 或 conda 管理的虚拟环境的处理。仅当虚拟环境处于活动状态（即，已评估 activate 脚本）时，它才有意义。在这种情况下，它优先于 Python2_FIND_REGISTRY 和 CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK 变量。所述 Python2_FIND_VIRTUALENV 变量可以被设置为执行以下操作之一：

trans-unit.source: This variable defines the handling of virtual environments managed by virtualenv or conda. It is meaningful only when a virtual environment is active (i.e. the activate script has been evaluated). In this case, it takes precedence over Python3_FIND_REGISTRY and CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK variables. The Python3_FIND_VIRTUALENV variable can be set to one of the following:

trans-unit.source: This variable exists only for backwards compatibility. It contains the same value as CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM. Use that variable instead.
trans-unit.target: 仅存在此变量是为了向后兼容。它包含与 CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM 相同的值。请改用该变量。

trans-unit.source: This variable has effect only when policy CMP0091 is set to NEW prior to the first project() or enable_language() command that enables a language using a compiler targeting the MSVC ABI.
trans-unit.target: 仅当在第一个 project() 或 enable_language() 命令之前将策略 CMP0091 设置为 NEW 时，此变量才有效，该命令使用针对MSVC ABI的编译器启用语言。

trans-unit.source: This variable has no effect for the component form of find_package. In backward compatibility mode (i.e. without components list) it prevents the finder module from searching for Graphviz’s dot utility.
trans-unit.target: 该变量对 find_package 的组件形式无效。在向后兼容模式下（即，没有组件列表），它阻止查找程序模块搜索Graphviz的 dot 实用程序。

trans-unit.source: This variable has no effect if CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG is set to TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG 设置为 TRUE ,则此变量无效。

trans-unit.source: This variable has no effect if the system libraries provide the thread functions, i.e. when CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT will be empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果系统库提供线程功能，即 CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT 为空，则此变量无效。

trans-unit.source: This variable has no effect. The partially implemented effect it had in previous releases was removed in CMake 3.4.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量没有效果。在以前的版本中,它的部分效果在CMake 3.4中被移除。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds a semicolon-separated list of tokens. If a space (i.e. ” “) is specified as last token, flag and LINKER: arguments will be specified as separate arguments to the compiler driver. The CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_WRAPPER_FLAG_SEP variable can be specified to manage concatenation of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 此变量保存以分号分隔的标记列表。如果将空格（即“”）指定为最后一个标记，则将flag和 LINKER: 参数指定为编译器驱动程序的单独参数。所述 CMAKE_<LANG>_LINKER_WRAPPER_FLAG_SEP 变量可被指定来管理的参数串联。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds arguments which are used when Eclipse invokes the make tool. By default it is initialized to hold flags to enable parallel builds (using -j typically).
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了Eclipse调用make工具时使用的参数,默认情况下,它被初始化为保存启用并行构建的标志(通常使用-j)。默认情况下,它被初始化为保存启用并行构建的标志 (通常使用 -j)。

trans-unit.source: This variable is a Read-Only variable which is set internally by CPack during installation and before packaging using CMAKE_ABSOLUTE_DESTINATION_FILES defined in cmake_install.cmake scripts. The value can be used within CPack project configuration file and/or CPack<GEN>.cmake file of <GEN> generator.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量是在安装期间和包装在使用前由CPack内部设置只读变量 CMAKE_ABSOLUTE_DESTINATION_FILES 中定义 cmake_install.cmake 脚本。该值可在CPack项目配置文件和/或 <GEN> 生成器的 CPack<GEN>.cmake 文件中使用。

trans-unit.source: This variable is a cache entry initialized (to FALSE) by the project() command. Users may enable the option in their local build tree to get more verbose output from Makefile builds and show each command line as it is launched.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是由 project() 命令初始化（对 FALSE ）的缓存条目。用户可以在本地构建树中启用该选项，以从Makefile构建中获取更多详细输出，并在启动每个命令行时显示它们。

trans-unit.source: This variable is a special case of the more-general CMAKE_<CONFIG>_POSTFIX variable for the DEBUG configuration.
trans-unit.target: 对于 DEBUG 配置，此变量是更通用的 CMAKE_<CONFIG>_POSTFIX 变量的特例。

trans-unit.source: This variable is an alternative to providing the --log-context option on the cmake command line. Whereas the command line option will apply only to that one CMake run, setting CMAKE_MESSAGE_CONTEXT_SHOW to true as a cache variable will ensure that subsequent CMake runs will continue to show the message context.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是在 cmake 命令行上提供 --log-context 选项的替代方法。命令行选项仅适用于该一次CMake运行，将 CMAKE_MESSAGE_CONTEXT_SHOW 设置为true作为缓存变量将确保后续的CMake运行将继续显示消息上下文。

trans-unit.source: This variable is defined by CMake-generated cmake_install.cmake scripts. It can be used (read-only) by programs or scripts that source those install scripts. This is used by some CPack generators (e.g. RPM).
trans-unit.target: 此变量由CMake生成的 cmake_install.cmake 脚本定义。源于那些安装脚本的程序或脚本可以使用它（只读）。一些CPack生成器（例如RPM）使用它。

trans-unit.source: This variable is ignored on platforms other than Apple.
trans-unit.target: 在苹果以外的平台上,这个变量会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This variable is initialized to the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_LAUNCHER environment variable if it is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置此变量，则将其初始化为 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_LAUNCHER 环境变量。

trans-unit.source: This variable is meant to be set by a toolchain file for such platforms.
trans-unit.target: 该变量由此类平台的 toolchain file 设置。

trans-unit.source: This variable is meant to be set by a toolchain file.
trans-unit.target: 该变量由 toolchain file 设置。

trans-unit.source: This variable is most useful when cross-compiling. CMake uses the paths in this list as alternative roots to find filesystem items with find_package(), find_library() etc.
trans-unit.target: 交叉编译时，此变量最有用。CMake使用此列表中的路径作为备用根，以使用 find_package() ， find_library() 等查找文件系统项。

trans-unit.source: This variable is not defined by other generators even if MSBuild.exe is installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 即使计算机上安装了 MSBuild.exe ，其他生成器也未定义此变量。

trans-unit.source: This variable is not defined by other generators even if devenv.com is installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 即使在计算机上安装了 devenv.com ，其他生成器也未定义此变量。

trans-unit.source: This variable is not guaranteed to be defined for all compilers or languages.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量不能保证为所有的编译器或语言所定义。

trans-unit.source: This variable is only evaluated for Visual Studio Generators VS 2010 and above.
trans-unit.target: 仅针对Visual Studio Generators VS 2010及更高版本评估此变量。

trans-unit.source: This variable is only used when CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING is on. It should point to a command on the host system that can run executable built for the target system.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING 启用时，才使用此变量。它应指向主机系统上的命令，该命令可以运行为目标系统构建的可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: This variable is read-only. Setting it is undefined behavior. In multi-configuration build systems the value of this variable is passed as the value of preprocessor symbol CMAKE_INTDIR to the compilation of all source files.
trans-unit.target: 该变量是只读的。设置它是未定义的行为。在多配置构建系统中，此变量的值作为预处理器符号 CMAKE_INTDIR 的值传递给所有源文件的编译。

trans-unit.source: This variable is set to ON by default if CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME equals to iOS, tvOS or watchOS.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 等于iOS，tvOS或watchOS，则此变量默认设置为 ON 。

trans-unit.source: This variable is specified on the command line when cross-compiling with CMake. It is the path to a file which is read early in the CMake run and which specifies locations for compilers and toolchain utilities, and other target platform and compiler related information.
trans-unit.target: 当与 CMake 交叉编译时,这个变量是在命令行中指定的,它是一个文件的路径,这个文件在 CMake 运行的早期就被读取了,它指定了编译器和工具链实用程序的位置,以及其他目标平台和编译器相关信息。它是一个文件的路径,在CMake运行的早期就被读取,它指定了编译器和工具链实用程序的位置,以及其他目标平台和编译器相关信息。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the Debug variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> variable.
trans-unit.target: 该变量是 Debug 所述的变体 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 变量。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the Debug variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT variable.
trans-unit.target: 该变量是 Debug 所述的变体 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT 变量。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the MinSizeRel variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> variable.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 变量的 MinSizeRel 变体。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the MinSizeRel variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT variable.
trans-unit.target: 该变量是 MinSizeRel 所述的变体 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT 变量。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the RelWithDebInfo variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> variable.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 变量的 RelWithDebInfo 变体。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the RelWithDebInfo variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT variable.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT 变量的 RelWithDebInfo 变体。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the Release variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> variable.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 变量的 Release 版本。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the Release variant of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT variable.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG>_INIT 变量的 Release 变体。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the composite of CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME and CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION, e.g. ${CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME}-${CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION}. If CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION is not set, then this variable is the same as CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 此变量是 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME 和 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION 的组合，例如 ${CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME}-${CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION} 。如果未设置 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION ，则此变量与 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME 相同。

trans-unit.source: This variable is the composite of CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME and CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION, e.g. ${CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME}-${CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION}. If CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION is not set, then this variable is the same as CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME.

trans-unit.source: This variable is the same as CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR if you build for the host system instead of the target system when cross compiling.
trans-unit.target: 如果在交叉编译时是为主机系统而不是目标系统构建的，则此变量与 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR 相同。

trans-unit.source: This variable is used to initialize the UNITY_BUILD property of targets when they are created. Setting it to true enables batch compilation of multiple sources within each target. This feature is known as a Unity or Jumbo build.

trans-unit.source: This variable is used to initialize the UNITY_BUILD_BATCH_SIZE property of targets when they are created. It specifies the default upper limit on the number of source files that may be combined in any one unity source file when unity builds are enabled for a target.
trans-unit.target: 创建目标时，此变量用于初始化目标的 UNITY_BUILD_BATCH_SIZE 属性。它为目标启用了统一构建时，指定了可以在任何一个统一源文件中合并的源文件数的默认上限。

trans-unit.source: This variable may be set to a path to install to when cross-compiling. This can be useful if the path in CMAKE_SYSROOT is read-only, or otherwise should remain pristine.
trans-unit.target: 可以将此变量设置为交叉编译时要安装到的路径。如果 CMAKE_SYSROOT 中的路径是只读的，否则应该保持原始状态，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: This variable may be useful when a developer has compiled a custom version of a common library and wishes to link it to a dependent project. If this variable is set to TRUE, it would prevent a dependent project’s call to find_package() from selecting the default library located by the system’s Find<pkg>.cmake module before finding the developer’s custom built library.
trans-unit.target: 当开发人员已编译公共库的自定义版本并希望将其链接到从属项目时，此变量可能很有用。如果此变量设置为 TRUE ，则它将防止从属项目对 find_package() 的调用选择系统的 Find<pkg>.cmake 模块位于的默认库，然后再查找开发人员的自定义生成的库。

trans-unit.source: This variable may hold a single prefix or a semicolon-separated list of multiple prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 该变量可以包含一个前缀或多个前缀的分号分隔列表。

trans-unit.source: This variable may hold a single prefix or a list of prefixes separated by : on UNIX or ; on Windows (the same as the PATH environment variable convention on those platforms).
trans-unit.target: 在UNIX或 ; 上，此变量可以包含一个前缀或前缀列表 : 在Windows上（与这些平台上的 PATH 环境变量约定相同）。

trans-unit.source: This variable may only be set in a toolchain file specified by the CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE variable.
trans-unit.target: 此变量只能在 CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE 变量指定的工具链文件中设置。

trans-unit.source: This variable serves the same purpose during packaging as the CMAKE_INSTALL_DEFAULT_DIRECTORY_PERMISSIONS variable serves during installation (e.g. make install).
trans-unit.target: 该变量在打包过程中的作用与 CMAKE_INSTALL_DEFAULT_DIRECTORY_PERMISSIONS 变量在安装过程中的作用相同（例如， make install ）。

trans-unit.source: This variable should not be set by a project in CMake code. Project developers running CMake may set this variable in their cache to enable the warning (e.g. -DCMAKE_POLICY_WARNING_CMP<NNNN>=ON). Alternatively, running cmake(1) with the --debug-output, --trace, or --trace-expand option will also enable the warning.
trans-unit.target: 该变量不应由项目在CMake代码中设置。运行CMake的项目开发人员可以在其缓存中设置此变量以启用警告（例如 -DCMAKE_POLICY_WARNING_CMP<NNNN>=ON ）。或者，使用 --debug-output ，-- --trace 或 --trace-expand 选项运行 cmake(1) 也将启用警告。

trans-unit.source: This variable should not be set by a project in CMake code; use cmake_policy(SET) instead. Users running CMake may set this variable in the cache (e.g. -DCMAKE_POLICY_DEFAULT_CMP<NNNN>=<OLD|NEW>) to set a policy not otherwise set by the project. Set to OLD to quiet a policy warning while using old behavior or to NEW to try building the project with new behavior.
trans-unit.target: 该变量不应由项目使用CMake代码设置；使用 cmake_policy(SET) 代替。运行CMake的用户可以在缓存中设置此变量（例如 -DCMAKE_POLICY_DEFAULT_CMP<NNNN>=<OLD|NEW> ）以设置项目未另行设置的策略。设置为 OLD 可以在使用旧行为时静默策略警告，或者设置为 NEW 可以尝试使用新行为构建项目。

trans-unit.source: This variable should not be set by project code. It is meant to be set by CMake’s platform information modules for the current toolchain, or by a toolchain file when used with CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE.
trans-unit.target: 此变量不应由项目代码设置。它是由CMake的当前工具链的平台信息模块或与 CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE 一起使用的工具链文件设置的。

trans-unit.source: This variable takes precedence over CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY when both are set.
trans-unit.target: 两者都设置时，此变量优先于 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 。

trans-unit.source: This variable takes precedence over CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY when both are set.
trans-unit.target: 两者都设置时，此变量优先于 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 。

trans-unit.source: This variable triggers the definition of CMAKE_WARN_ON_ABSOLUTE_INSTALL_DESTINATION when CPack runs cmake_install.cmake scripts.
trans-unit.target: 当CPack运行 cmake_install.cmake 脚本时，此变量将触发 CMAKE_WARN_ON_ABSOLUTE_INSTALL_DESTINATION 的定义。

trans-unit.source: This variable will be set to true by CMake if the CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME variable has been set manually (i.e. in a toolchain file or as a cache entry from the cmake command line). In most cases, manually setting CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME will only be done when cross compiling, since it will otherwise be given the same value as CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME if not manually set, which is correct for the non-cross-compiling case. In the event that CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME is manually set to the same value as CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME, then CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING will still be set to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果已手动设置 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 变量（即在工具链文件中或作为 cmake 命令行的缓存条目），则CMake会将此变量设置为true 。在大多数情况下，只有在交叉编译时才手动设置 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME ，因为如果不手动设置，将获得与 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME 相同的值，这对于非交叉编译情况是正确的。如果将 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 手动设置为与 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_NAME 相同的值，则 CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING 仍将设置为true。

trans-unit.source: This variable will only be defined if ctest(1) has been given a --resource-spec-file, or if ctest_test() has been given a RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE. If no resource specification file has been given, this variable will not be defined.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 ctest(1) 一个 --resource-spec-file 或给 ctest_test() 一个 RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE 时，才定义此变量。如果未提供资源规范文件，则不会定义此变量。

trans-unit.source: This was undocumented behavior.
trans-unit.target: 这是无证行为。

trans-unit.source: This way, the build specification of exe1 is expressed entirely as linked targets, and the complexity of compiler-specific flags is encapsulated in an INTERFACE library target.
trans-unit.target: 这样， exe1 的构建规范就完全表示为链接目标，并且编译器特定标志的复杂性封装在 INTERFACE 库目标中。

trans-unit.source: This will also be used to display a weighted test timing result in label and subproject summaries in the command line output of ctest(1). The wall clock time for the test run will be multiplied by this property to give a better idea of how much cpu resource CTest allocated for the test.
trans-unit.target: 这还将用于在 ctest(1) 的命令行输出中的标签和子项目摘要中显示加权测试计时结果。测试运行的挂钟时间将与此属性相乘，以更好地了解为测试分配了多少CPU资源CTest。

trans-unit.source: This will be the working directory for the test. If specified it will also be the output directory used for the log file of the test run. If not specified the temporary directory ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/Matlab will be used as the working directory and the log location.
trans-unit.target: 这将是测试的工作目录。如果指定，它将也是用于测试运行的日志文件的输出目录。如果未指定，则临时目录 ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/Matlab 将用作工作目录和日志位置。

trans-unit.source: This will cause the export macros to expand to nothing when building the static library.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致在构建静态库时,导出的宏扩展为零。

trans-unit.source: This will check that the REQUIRED_VARS contain values (that do not end in -NOTFOUND) and set Foo_FOUND appropriately. It will also cache those values. If Foo_VERSION is set, and a required version was passed to find_package(), it will check the requested version against the one in Foo_VERSION. It will also print messages as appropriate; note that if the package was found, it will print the contents of the first required variable to indicate where it was found.
trans-unit.target: 这将检查 REQUIRED_VARS 是否包含值（以 -NOTFOUND 结尾的值），并适当地设置 Foo_FOUND 。它还将缓存这些值。如果 Foo_VERSION 设置，并且所需的版本传递给 find_package() ,它会检查对一个在请求的版本 Foo_VERSION 。它还将适当地打印消息；请注意，如果找到该程序包，它将打印第一个必需变量的内容以指示在哪里找到了它。

trans-unit.source: This will store in <var> a semicolon-separated list in which the first element is the name of the command to be called, and the remaining elements are its unevaluated arguments (any contained ; characters are included literally and cannot be distinguished from multiple arguments). If multiple calls are scheduled with the same id, this retrieves the first one. If no call is scheduled with the given id, this stores an empty string in the variable.
trans-unit.target: 这将在 <var> 中存储一个以分号分隔的列表，其中第一个元素是要调用的命令的名称，其余元素是其未求值的参数（任何包含的内容 ; 字符按字面意义包含且不能与多个参数区分开）。如果安排了多个具有相同ID的呼叫，则将检索第一个。如果没有使用给定的ID安排任何呼叫，则此操作将在变量中存储一个空字符串。
